agent_utterance: For this hot Monday evening, try a cooling, small snack and a quick check-in: - 30 g yogurt with a few berries - 1 glass (about 250 ml) of water - take a 60-second breath pause (inhale 4s, exhale 6s) - set a timer for 60–90 minutes and do a quick 0–10 rating of hunger, mood, and thirst. Aim for about 4.1/5 satisfaction from this snack and nudges. If still peckish, add a cucumber slice or a splash of cold tea to keep it refreshing.

This aligns with the user’s preference for short, actionable nudges and small steps.
